glyph.name: Building Trust (Applied Harmony)
glyph.description: Trust isn't something you earn through performanceâ€”it's something you become through consistent, patient presence. This practice transforms you into a reliable sanctuary where others can safely share their truth. It is the applied harmony of becoming a safe place for others' vulnerability.
glyph.practice: Cultivate internal reliability and consistency. Practice becoming someone whose word can be trusted completely, starting with small commitments and building to larger ones.

interpretation:
A deep root anchors in the quiet earth.
Rings slowly widen within the ancient trunk.
A nest rests safely in the sheltering branches.
